review.title: “Very professional, no micro management. Incredible team!”
review.pros: Pros – Ihave been given respect, and encouragement and support throughout my 5 years. I couldn't work for better company. They do not match 401k which was taken away due to economy fall in 2008. Great owners, family first! I hope I lovely job!
review.cons: Cons – Insurance, and 401k no match, and chargebacks on cancels are not done correct in my opinion.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – None! I hope to work with you many years to come!
